resources.string:
Hi, my name is Miguel Colon. 

I love Android Studio. 

i dont know how i can do apps but i will learn. 
i like webs but now the apps are the best option. 

webs pages have a lot of designs, and this is the reason that i love it. 
And Yes, im a Front-end developer, or thats what i think. 
am new developing apps, i only have a restaurant app and a calculator. 

This is an example, and if you read my english isnt the best in the world. 

I'll be happy to develope apps for my futures clients, thats make me happy 
See you next time, for contact me here is my instagram @MiguelAC_
